review_data.title: Location ok, food great and staff very friendly

review_data.title: Quite good
review_data.content: Had Zürcher Geschnetzeltes there, and it was quite nice! Loved the Swiss rosti a lot. The lady serving us was very friendly.

review_data.title: Best schnitzel in Zurich
review_data.content: This place has been my favourite place for schnitzel for years! It’s just superb. The Schnitzel’s thickness, crunchiness and taste is amazing. Service is great, the people in charge are very helpful and friendly. It’s a very local and traditional, chilled place. Hot stone steak...More

review_data.title: Must go!
review_data.content: A charming and unpretentious restaurant in a very nice quarter of Zurich. The delightful hosts made us feel at home right away. The food and wine were excellent. We had a very pleasurable evening and shall return soon. A reservation is recommended for the evenings.
